title: Person
description: Declarations of (data) types for use within this API

children.title: name
children.description: Type name for top level types. For properties and parameters -- property o parameter name, respectively. For bodies -- media type.

children.title: allowedTargets
children.description: Restrictions on where annotations of this type can be applied. If this property is specified, annotations of this type may only be applied on a property corresponding to one of the target names specified as the value of this property.

children.title: default
children.description: Provides default value for a property

children.title: displayName
children.description: The displayName attribute specifies the type display name. It is a friendly name used only for  display or documentation purposes. If displayName is not specified, it defaults to the element's key (the name of the property itself).

children.title: description
children.description: A longer, human-friendly description of the type

children.title: enum
children.description: (Optional, applicable only for parameters of type string) The enum attribute provides an enumeration of the parameter's valid values. This MUST be an array. If the enum attribute is defined, API clients and servers MUST verify that a parameter's value matches a value in the enum array. If there is no matching value, the clients and servers MUST treat this as an error.

children.title: maximum
children.description: (Optional, applicable only for parameters of type number or integer) The maximum attribute specifies the parameter's maximum value.

children.title: minimum
children.description: (Optional, applicable only for parameters of type number or integer) The minimum attribute specifies the parameter's minimum value.

children.title: multipleOf
children.description: A numeric instance is valid against "multipleOf" if the result of the division of the instance by this keyword's value is an integer.

children.title: type
children.description: A base type which the current type extends, or more generally a type expression.

children.title: Type
children.description: A base type which the current type extends, or more generally a type expression.
